message.content:
The task is to identify the line item and value that represents the accumulated systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is typically recorded as "Depreciation" on the income statement.

Looking at the provided income statement data, the relevant line item is:

| Account     | Amount    | Date       |
|-------------|-----------|------------|
| Depreciation | 120970.16 | 2024-02-05 |

This is the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount over the useful life of the asset.

Hence, the solution is:

```json
{"solution": {"value": "120970.16"}}
```
